title: prescribed for the purposes of section 14(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Building Control (Prescribed
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Building Control (Prescribed 

Qualifications) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited building control (prescribed qualifications) regulation 2022

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 14(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: 2. The qualification specified in the Schedule to these Regulations is
text_raw:
2. The qualification specified in the Schedule to these Regulations is 
prescribed for the purposes of section 14(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act 
2007 (No. 21 of 2007). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 March, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th March, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [114] 3
text_norm: 2 qualification specified schedule regulation prescribed purpose section 14(2)(a)(iii) building control act 2007 (no 21 2007) given official seal 9 march 2022 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th march 2022 114 3

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 14(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: PRESCRIBED QUALIFICATION
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PRESCRIBED QUALIFICATION 

The following qualification is prescribed pursuant to section 14(2)(a)(iii) of the 
Building Control Act 2007: 

(i) Master of Architecture (M Arch) awarded by Technological 

University Dublin. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [114]
text_norm: schedule prescribed qualification following qualification prescribed pursuant section 14(2)(a)(iii) building control act 2007 (i) master architecture (m arch) awarded technological university dublin 4 114

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 14(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Section 14 of the Building Control Act 2007 provides that the Minister may 
prescribe additional qualifications and educational bodies to those recognised in 
the Act as being suitable for the purpose of the registration of certain persons on 
the register of Architects established under Part 3 of the Building Control Act
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) section 14 building control act 2007 provides minister may prescribe additional qualification educational body recognised act suitable purpose registration certain person register architect established part 3 building control act

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 14(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: The qualification as referred to in the Schedule, is newly prescribed under these
text_raw:
2007. 

The qualification as referred to in the Schedule, is newly prescribed under these 
Regulations.
